data.title: Bakersfield, CA Public Schools
data.meta_description: Find the best schools in Bakersfield for your child with a map, average proficiency test scores and more.
data.text: There are a total of 131 public schools, 27 private schools and 11 post-secondary schools in Bakersfield. Using the proficiency score averages, the average test scores for Bakersfield, CA schools is 37%. The average student to teacher ratio is 21:1. In Bakersfield, CA, an average of 77.3% of students have completed 8th grade and an average of 76.2% have completed high school.
